info.author: Julio Marquez
info.description:
=============================
Django Premail
=============================

.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/django-premail.png
    :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/django-premail

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/bazzite/django-premail.png?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/bazzite/django-premail

Django template tag that turns CSS blocks into inline style attributes for HTML emails using premailer.

Documentation
-------------

The full documentation is at https://django-premail.readthedocs.io.

Quickstart
----------

Install Django Premail::

    pip install django-premail

Add it to your `INSTALLED_APPS`:

.. code-block:: python

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...
        'django_premail',
        ...
    )

Add Django Premail's URL patterns:

.. code-block:: python

    from django_premail import urls as django_premail_urls


    urlpatterns = [
        ...
        url(r'^', include(django_premail_urls)),
        ...
    ]

--------

* TODO

Running Tests
-------------

Does the code actually work?

::

    source <YOURVIRTUALENV>/bin/activate
    (myenv) $ pip install tox
    (myenv) $ tox
